If you're in the mood for something more action-packed with a hint of politics, I'd recommend "My Fellow Americans". This comedy stars two former Presidents (played by Jack Lemmon and James Garner) who team up to take down the current corrupt President. The movie has some great comedic moments, and it's a fun ride!
